The arithmetic mean of a set of $50$ numbers is $38$. If two numbers of the set, namely $45$ and $55$, are discarded, the arithmetic mean of the remaining set of numbers is:\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 38.5 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 37.5 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 37 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 36.5 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 36$
